text: Great pub style food, and chips as good as the chip truck. Awesome summer patio too!

Place is now closed and soon to be opened as "Harvest"
Same owner ... hopefully it will be better.
Brown lettuce on a $2 upgrade for an over priced sandwich kind of ruined the experience.
Poor service. Over cooked steak. Took an hour to get a new one. Then took twenty minutes just to get a desert menu. Coffee machine broken. Huge bill. Left pissed off. Will not return. Ever.
